name: The Artifact (itch) (Ewan Stewart, TomyB, Nathan Fordyce)
name_original: The Artifact (itch) (Ewan Stewart, TomyB, Nathan Fordyce)
description:
Made for Adventure Jam 2022 

Description: You the adventurer, an outsider, descends on the environment of Calendonia. Talk to the native people to gain insight into obtaining the renowned Artifact.

Made By: Ewan Stewart, Nathan Fordyce, and Thomas B

Note: none of the art and sound assets used were made by us, we are just programmers :P

Known Issues:

  • Some materials appear black
  • Game closes when players health reaches zero or game is completed.
  • Enemies can become invincible (to fix unload the area by walking far away then go back to respawn enemies)
